summary: Aleanso Ortiz is a character reference for Manuel Marti. In November 1968, an agent attempted to verify information provided by Ortiz as part of a character reference check for Marti. Another agent report details an unsuccessful attempt to locate and interview Ortiz at 810 Hunts Point Avenue, Bronx, New York. The physical check yielded no information regarding Ortiz or Marti.
significance: Ortiz's significance lies in being a listed character reference for Manuel Marti, whose background was being investigated. The inability to locate or verify information from Ortiz raises questions about the reliability of Marti's references.
